title: Russia has not shared nukes with neighbors

content.prompt: All of the following are policies that Russia has pursued in its relations with neighboring states since 2000 EXCEPT

choices.label: support of regions wanting to break away from Georgia
increased aid for regimes that align with Russia
increased sharing of nuclear technology with all former Soviet republics
diplomatic pressure to force Ukraine and Belarus to pay more for natural gas

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
